text: addeham (takkitukaran) parannu: ninnal ninnalute pitakkale etearu margattil kantettiyea, atinekkalum nalla margam kaniccutarunna oru sandesavum keant nan ninnalute atutt vannalum (ninnal pitakkalettanne anukarikkukayea?) avar parannu; ninnal etearu sandesavum keant ayakkappettirikkunnuvea atil tirccayayum nannal visvasamillattavarakunnu
